actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER SET
    CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_CIN = '{{vayIndCCin.text}}',
        CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_IECNO = '{{Input1.text}}',
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_WEBSITE = '{{Input3.text}}',
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_COMM_DATE = '{{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}',
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_NATURE   = '{{vayIndCBusinessNature.selectedOptionValue}}',
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID = '{{Input2.text}}',
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_NATURE_ACTIVITY = '{{vayIndCNatureActivity.text}}'  WHERE  OID = '{{appsmith.store.customerOID }}';
